messages.title: JON SAYS
messages.content: I am 57, married, have three grown up children and have lived in the constituency for 40 years. I work for a transport consultancy based in London.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a publicly funded NHS free at the point of use, end the creeping privatisation of services.

Ensure the super-rich pay fair taxes, introduce a wealth tax on the richest 1%, close tax loopholes, a minimum wage of Â£10 per hour by 2020, create a million green economy jobs, many in home insulation. Cut unemployment benefits, getting people back to work.
Abolish the unfair Bedroom Tax, build 500,000 new social rented homes and bring empty homes back into use. Introduce rent caps and longer tenancies for renters.

issues.brexitEurope: AN EU REFERENDUM AND A FAIRER BRITAIN
issues.economy: Ensure the super-rich pay fair taxes, introduce a wealth tax on the richest 1%, close tax loopholes.
issues.environment: Create a million green economy jobs, many in home insulation.
issues.health: Fight for a publicly funded NHS free at the point of use, end the creeping privatisation of services.

housing.content: Abolish the unfair Bedroom Tax, build 500,000 new social rented homes and bring empty homes back into use. Introduce rent caps and longer tenancies for renters.
